mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_SUB(NUM, NICKNAME, NAME, GENDER, STOREDATE) values (MEMBER_SUB_SEQ.nextval, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{gender}, add_months(sysdate, ${storedate}))
mapper.update: update MEMBER_SUB set GENDER=#{gender}, STOREDATE=add_months(sysdate, ${storedate}), MODDATE=sysdate where NICKNAME=#{nickname}
mapper.select: select WARNCOUNT, POINT from MEMBER_SUB where NICKNAME=#{nickname}
